tests.name: Attendance Service Integration Tests Check-in/Check-out POST /api/attendance/check-in - Employee Check-in should record employee check-in
Attendance Service Integration Tests Check-in/Check-out POST /api/attendance/check-out - Employee Check-out should record employee check-out
Attendance Service Integration Tests Attendance Records GET /api/attendance - List Attendance Records should return list of attendance records
Attendance Service Integration Tests Attendance Records GET /api/attendance - List Attendance Records should filter attendance by date range
Attendance Service Integration Tests Attendance Records GET /api/attendance - List Attendance Records should filter attendance by employee
Attendance Service Integration Tests Attendance Records GET /api/attendance/summary - Get Attendance Summary should return attendance summary
Attendance Service Integration Tests Attendance Records GET /api/attendance/daily-status - Get Daily Status should return daily attendance status
Attendance Service Integration Tests Bulk Operations POST /api/attendance/bulk - Bulk Mark Attendance should mark attendance for multiple employees
Employee Service Integration Tests Department Management POST /api/employees/departments - Create Department should create a new department
Employee Service Integration Tests Department Management GET /api/employees/departments - List Departments should return list of departments
Employee Service Integration Tests Employee Management POST /api/employees - Create Employee should create a new employee
Employee Service Integration Tests Employee Management GET /api/employees - List Employees should return paginated list of employees
Employee Service Integration Tests Employee Management GET /api/employees - List Employees should filter employees by department
Employee Service Integration Tests Employee Management GET /api/employees/:id - Get Employee by ID should return employee details
Employee Service Integration Tests Employee Management GET /api/employees/:id - Get Employee by ID should return 404 for non-existent employee
Employee Service Integration Tests Employee Management PUT /api/employees/:id - Update Employee should update employee details
Employee Service Integration Tests Dashboard Statistics GET /api/employees/dashboard/stats - Get Dashboard Stats should return dashboard statistics
Service Health Check Tests Service Availability API Gateway should be healthy
Service Health Check Tests Service Availability Auth Service should be healthy
Service Health Check Tests Service Availability Employee Service should be healthy
Service Health Check Tests Service Availability Leave Service should be healthy
Service Health Check Tests Service Availability Attendance Service should be healthy
Service Health Check Tests Service Availability Payroll Service should be healthy
Service Health Check Tests Service Availability Tenant Service should be healthy
Service Health Check Tests Service Availability Notification Service should be healthy
Service Health Check Tests API Gateway Routing should route to auth service
Service Health Check Tests API Gateway Routing should route to employee service
Service Health Check Tests Database Connectivity should have MongoDB connection
Service Health Check Tests Response Format should return JSON responses
Service Health Check Tests Response Format should include CORS headers
Leave Service Integration Tests Leave Types Management GET /api/leaves/types - List Leave Types should return list of leave types
Leave Service Integration Tests Leave Types Management POST /api/leaves/types - Create Leave Type should create a new leave type
Leave Service Integration Tests Leave Requests POST /api/leaves - Create Leave Request should create a new leave request
Leave Service Integration Tests Leave Requests GET /api/leaves - List Leave Requests should return list of leave requests
Leave Service Integration Tests Leave Requests GET /api/leaves - List Leave Requests should filter leaves by status
Leave Service Integration Tests Leave Requests PATCH /api/leaves/:id/approve - Approve Leave should approve a leave request
Leave Service Integration Tests Holidays GET /api/leaves/holidays - List Holidays should return list of holidays
Leave Service Integration Tests Holidays POST /api/leaves/holidays - Create Holiday should create a new holiday
Leave Service Integration Tests Leave Balance GET /api/leaves/balance/:employeeId - Get Leave Balance should return employee leave balance
Payroll Service Integration Tests Salary Structure Management POST /api/payroll/structures - Create Salary Structure should create a new salary structure
Payroll Service Integration Tests Salary Structure Management GET /api/payroll/structures - List Salary Structures should return list of salary structures
Payroll Service Integration Tests Employee Salary Assignment POST /api/payroll/employee-salary - Assign Salary should assign salary structure to employee
Payroll Service Integration Tests Employee Salary Assignment GET /api/payroll/employee-salary/:employeeId - Get Employee Salary should return employee salary details
Payroll Service Integration Tests Payroll Generation POST /api/payroll/generate - Generate Payroll should generate payroll for an employee
Payroll Service Integration Tests Payroll Generation POST /api/payroll/generate/bulk - Bulk Generate Payroll should generate payroll for all employees
Payroll Service Integration Tests Payroll Records GET /api/payroll - List Payrolls should return list of payroll records
Payroll Service Integration Tests Payroll Records GET /api/payroll - List Payrolls should filter payrolls by month and year
Payroll Service Integration Tests Payroll Records GET /api/payroll/summary - Get Payroll Summary should return payroll summary
Payroll Service Integration Tests Payroll Processing PATCH /api/payroll/:id/process - Process Payroll should process a payroll record
Payroll Service Integration Tests Payroll Processing PATCH /api/payroll/:id/pay - Mark as Paid should mark payroll as paid
Authentication Service Integration Tests POST /api/auth/register - Tenant Registration should register a new tenant successfully
Authentication Service Integration Tests POST /api/auth/register - Tenant Registration should reject duplicate email registration
Authentication Service Integration Tests POST /api/auth/login - User Login should login with valid credentials
Authentication Service Integration Tests POST /api/auth/login - User Login should reject invalid credentials
Authentication Service Integration Tests GET /api/auth/me - Get Current User should return current user profile
Authentication Service Integration Tests GET /api/auth/me - Get Current User should reject unauthorized request
Authentication Service Integration Tests POST /api/auth/refresh - Token Refresh should refresh access token
